link.title: Chaparral Schools
link.script:

hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

p.em: Our vision is to empower students to reach their full potential. Our focus is to serve students. We aim to be student centered through personalized teaching and learning opportunities. We believe all can and want to learn. Successful students and graduates demonstrate the ability to adapt, strong interpersonal skills, social responsibilities and academic preparedness.
